subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The PGA Tour veteran John Daly was taken into custody Sunday morning by the Winston-Salem, N.C., police after he was found drunk outside a Hooters restaurant. The police said in a statement Wednesday that officers went to the restaurant on a medical call. When they arrived, Daly was being treated by emergency workers after losing consciousness.
